about:
To those of you who don't know me, I am Alex and I help run things in 'Pursue' we are known as Team Pursue because it works together. Anyway, I am a Freelance Graphic Designer and unemployed at the moment, however my passion for gaming is strong but not like before. I am here to help keep things running and with your dedication and commitment, we will be able to make this clan a success.
I am from Cambridgeshire in the UK (England) and I am 23 years old!
Enough of my boring intro, hopefully I can jump on Ts3 and BF3 *Once the game starts playing again*
I'm as cool and edgy as anyone else

Hello!
I'm Jens. I used to play in the same clan as Hobbsy 
I work as a production operator, not fulltime though.
I try to be active as much as I can and lead our battlefield side with Duckling, if you have any questions regarding this, dont be afraid to ask!
Oh btw, I come from Sweden (vikingland) and I'm 21yrs old.

Hello,
My name is Victor (16), im leading the competitive gaming together with Jens.
I've just graduated High school, and now im going to another school oriented on welding.
On my free time, I play fotball (soccer), computer as much as i can and hang out with my girlfriend.
I live in Sweden (vikingland) 
And im also an former STD player
Hello im Ross, i guess you could call me the baby of the clan *\o/*
